* BrightBlade heard Black Arachnia�s transmission and stopped, what was she 
talking about? Megatron in charge? She had thought that it was Hell Beast 
who had the Predacons, her being his second-in-command.
But she simply shrugged and continued, finally ready for the download.
She opened her com-link to the Predacon base, again in the coded 
transmission. *

� BrightBlade to Predacon base, be ready for download�NOW.�

* And with that she activated the download, schematics of the Cybertronien 
Fire�s defensive systems transferring from the main comp into the Predacon 
main hard-drive. However, there were quite a few systems in which she had 
coded on purpose, far to important to just let anybot go through them. Such 
as shield codes and weaponry defenses, all coded in patterns that only she 
could decode. No way for any other to break into them.
It was then that she suddenly heard the door seal shut, then realizing that 
she had been found out. She cursed to herself and opened a COM to Perndabot. 
*

� I�ve ran into a spot of trouble, It�ll be an emergency evac. You might get 
your chance to kick a little Maximal butt after all.�

* With that she deactivated her com-link and finally finished the info 
transfer, leaning back and deactivating the comp. Shutting it and looking 
towards the air vent.
With a growl she realized that it was sealed off as well.
Then the sprinklers activated, as well as a fair amount of foam erupting 
from the walls.
With a yell of surprise she found herself covered with foam, knowing that 
they would know where she was now. But she had her own plans.
With a sigh of annoyance she wiped the foam from her eyes and headed over to 
the far wall, scooting to the side as a foam spray activated. Looking at it 
for a moment, noticing just how much pressure the foam was emitting as it 
emerge. A smile coming across her face as she realized that she would have a 
way out after all. Then plugging it with her finger she leaned against the 
wall with her elbow, smiling wider as she heard the sound of an erupting 
pipe and a gushing sound.
With all the passer of the foam, her finger plugging it�s only escape route 
so it had to find another way out. So, the pipe exploded and now the foam 
would be running into the systems or on the floor on the other side of the 
wall.
If it was the systems then it would short circuit them, the seals around the 
vent she had first come in deactivating and letting her out.
If not, she would be forced to use more expensive tactics. *
